ROM.Changelog:
### RR v5.7.2 20160803 * by Naman Bhalla * Android v6.0.1_r61 - Security Patch Level: 5 August 2016 * Use Resurrected-ElementalX kernel by default * Include several optimizations to improve battery life * Remove new OTA app temporary - it will be included in next build again
### RR v5.7.1 20160730 * by sunsettrack4 * Add support for Dash Charge * Update sRGB features (Live Display) * New OTA Updates app offers MD5 Check, direct downloads and OpenRecovery script * Several updates from CM and RR (2016/07/30 9AM CEST) * Use CM kernel by default - EX kernel can be found in addons menu.
